title: Trailblazer League/Areas/Karamja

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Karamja Area covers the entire island of Karamja along with the island of Crandor and the Realm of the Fisher King. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in Karamja are also included. When purchasing a Player Owned House from an Estate Agent your house will be placed in Brimhaven so that Construction can be trained from level 1.

content:
The Karamja Area covers the entire island of Karamja along with the island of Crandor and the Realm of the Fisher King. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in Karamja are also included. When purchasing a Player Owned House from an Estate Agent your house will be placed in Brimhaven so that Construction can be trained from level 1.

Contents

  • 1 Overview of area
    • 1.1 Notable settlements
    • 1.2 Notable combat-related activities
    • 1.3 Notable non-combat activities
    • 1.4 Notable shops
    • 1.5 Slayer tasks added
  • 2 Unlocks
    • 2.1 Quests
    • 2.2 Achievement diary tasks
  • 3 Notable drops

Overview of area[edit | edit source]

Notable settlements[edit | edit source]

  • Brimhaven
  • Karamja Ship Yard
  • Musa Point
  • Shilo Village
  • Tai Bwo Wannai
  • Mor-Ul-Rek

Notable combat-related activities[edit | edit source]

  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Duradel slayer tasks
  • Tai Bwo Wannai Dungeon (Jogre Dungeon)
  • The Fight Caves
  • The Fight Pits
  • The Inferno
  • Tzhaar creatures

Notable non-combat activities[edit | edit source]

  • Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Brimhaven House Portal
  • Calquat tree patch
  • Fishing infernal eel
  • Fruit tree patch north of Brimhaven
  • Fishing karambwan
  • Nature Altar
  • Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup
  • Teak and Mahogany woodcutting
  • Tzhaar pickpocketing
  • Thieving from the gem stall in Mor-Ul-Rek
  • Uncut gems from the Shilo Village mine

Notable shops[edit | edit source]

  • TzHaar-Hur-Tel's Equipment Store
  • TzHaar-Mej-Roh's Rune Store
  • TzHaar-Hur-Lek's Ore and Gem Store
  • Jiminua's Jungle Store.
  • Obli's General Store.
  • The Shrimp and Parrot
  • Tiadeche's Karambwan Stall

Slayer tasks added[edit | edit source]

Unlocking Karamja will add the following tasks to your slayer list:

  • Fire Giants
  • Greater Demons
  • Harpie bug swarms
  • Iron dragons
  • Steel dragons
  • Tzhaar

Unlocks[edit | edit source]

The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Shilo Village
    • Jungle Potion

Achievement diary tasks[edit | edit source]

Automatically completed diary tasks upon area unlock
Karamja Diary
Easy Tasks
  • Travel to Port Sarim via the dock, east of Musa Point.
  • Travel to Ardougne via the port near Brimhaven.
Medium Tasks
  • Charter the Lady of the Waves from south of Cairn Isle to Port Khazard.
  • Use the gnome glider to travel to Karamja.
  • Charter a ship from the shipyard in the far east of Karamja.
Hard Tasks
  • Eat an oomlie wrap.
  • Kill a deathwing in the dungeon under the Kharazi Jungle.
  • Collect 5 palm leaves.
Elite Tasks
  • Create an antivenom potion whilst standing in the horse shoe mine.

Notable drops[edit | edit source]

These items are highlighted as key drops from the area which are affected by the boosted drop rate granted by passive relics at tier 3 and tier 5.

rawContent:
The '''Karamja Area''' covers the entire island of [[Karamja]] along with the island of [[Crandor]] and the [[Realm of the Fisher King]]. Underground areas and [[instance|instanced areas]] with an entrance in Karamja are also included. When purchasing a [[Player Owned House]] from an [[Estate Agent]] your house will be placed in [[Brimhaven]] so that [[Construction]] can be trained from level 1.

==Overview of area==
===Notable settlements===
* [[Brimhaven]]
* [[Ship Yard|Karamja Ship Yard]]
* [[Musa Point]]
* [[Shilo Village]]
* [[Tai Bwo Wannai]]
* [[Mor Ul Rek|Mor-Ul-Rek]]

===Notable combat-related activities===
* [[Brimhaven Dungeon]]
* [[Duradel|Duradel slayer tasks]]
* Tai Bwo Wannai Dungeon ([[Pothole Dungeon|Jogre Dungeon]])
* [[Fight Caves|The Fight Caves]]
* [[Fight pits|The Fight Pits]]
* [[The Inferno]]
* [[TzHaar|Tzhaar creatures]]

===Notable non-combat activities===
* [[Brimhaven Agility Arena]]
* Brimhaven House Portal
* [[Calquat]] tree patch
* Fishing [[infernal eel]]
* [[Fruit tree patch]] north of Brimhaven
* Fishing [[karambwan]]
*[[Nature Altar]]
* [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]]
* [[Teak]] and [[Mahogany]] woodcutting
* [[Tzhaar]] pickpocketing
* Thieving from the [[gem stall]] in Mor-Ul-Rek
*Uncut gems from the [[Shilo Village mine]]

===Notable shops===
* [[TzHaar-Hur-Tel's Equipment Store]]
* [[TzHaar-Mej-Roh's Rune Store]]
* [[TzHaar-Hur-Lek's Ore and Gem Store]]
* [[Jiminua's Jungle Store.]]
* [[Obli's General Store.]]
* [[The Shrimp and Parrot]]
* [[Tiadeche's Karambwan Stall]]

===Slayer tasks added===
Unlocking Karamja will add the following tasks to your slayer list:
* [[Fire Giants]]
* [[Greater Demons]]
* [[Harpie bug swarms]]
* [[Iron dragons]]
* [[Steel dragons]]
* [[Tzhaar]]

==Unlocks==
The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.
===Quests===
* [[Shilo Village]]
** [[Jungle Potion]]

===Achievement diary tasks===
{| class="wikitable"
|+ Automatically completed diary tasks upon area unlock
!
! [[Karamja Diary]]
|-
! Easy Tasks
| 
* Travel to [[Port Sarim]] via the dock, east of [[Musa Point]].
* Travel to [[Ardougne]] via the port near [[Brimhaven]].
|-
! Medium Tasks
|
* Charter the [[Lady of the Waves]] from south of [[Cairn Isle]] to [[Port Khazard]].
* Use the [[gnome glider]] to travel to [[Karamja]].
* Charter a ship from the [[shipyard]] in the far east of [[Karamja]].
|-
! Hard Tasks
|
* Eat an [[oomlie wrap]].
* Kill a [[deathwing]] in the [[Viyeldi caves|dungeon]] under the [[Kharazi Jungle]].
* Collect 5 [[palm leaves]].
|-
! Elite Tasks
|
* Create an [[Anti-venom|antivenom]] potion whilst standing in the [[Horseshoe mine|horse shoe mine]].
|}

==Notable drops==
These items are highlighted as key drops from the area which are affected by the boosted drop rate granted by passive relics at tier 3 and tier 5.
